parts.text: If :NAME played the word :ENGLISH_WORD in scrabble, and :NAME played :ENGLISH_WORD, who scored higher? Make sure to consider valid only those words that are listed in the dictionary.

functionDeclarations.name: get_min_scrabble_word_score
functionDeclarations.description: Returns the minimum score for a given word in the game Scrabble (tm)

functionDeclarations.name: get_is_known_word
functionDeclarations.description: Returns true or false, indicating whether the candidate string is actually a word listed in the dictionary.
